Standard

$300 billed annually, $330 billed monthly
  • 1 Project (android/ios app or web app)
  • 2 people dedicated staff
  • Web Assistance

Business

$500 per month, billed annually, $550 billed monthly
  • 3 Projects (android, ios and web app)
  • 4 people dedicated staff
  • Web and Telephonic assistance
  • SEO and Advertisement

Enterprise

$800 base plan billed annually
  • 5 projects (android, ios, microsoft, linux and web app)
  • 6 people dedicated staff
  • Full assistance 24/7
  • SEO, Advertisement and Hacking-proof
  • Dedicated environment
